column4: hi guys, i'm new to linux and i have trouble installing dropbox through the command line
(running a vm of mininet, no gui)
really? i saw plenty of tutos and tricks and such, but i don't know which i should use
do you know how to do it?
i'm really sry, this is prob my 4h 5th command on a proper linux...
Not a good idea for a server
hm i'm not on a server
so i shouldn't install nautilus? then no dropbox?
Not if you want to keep it gui-less
i don't really care about having it gui-less. i just need it to run! ;)
